titleStmt.title: To the Kings Excellent Majesty, the humble address of the magistrats and council of His Majesties city of Edinburgh, for themselves, and in name of the whole inhabitants thereof
titleStmt.author: Edinburgh (Scotland). Town Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at London and re-printed at Edinburgh by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
